Description.Text: Marshal Garden is a contemporary 5-star property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Bucharest. Highlights include an international restaurant, gym and free Wi-Fi. Bucharest is steeped in history, as evidenced by its impressive architecture - ranging from medieval, neoclassical and Art Nouveau through to imposing communist-era buildings and sleek, modern structures. Nearby places of interest include the National Museum of Art of Romania, the Romanian Athenaeum and the imposing Palace of the Parliament, which houses the National Museum of Contemporary Art. Stefan cel Mare metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Bucharest destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise property. Facilities include a gym and a sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 25sqm and decorated in a unique contemporary style with bold stripes, deep blue carpets and glass walls allowing for plenty of natural light. They feature a balcony with garden views. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning, bathrobes and slippers. The glass-walled en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Danieli restaurant offers Italian and international dishes in a contemporary dining room featuring stained glass windows. The restaurant also boasts a terrace. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the lobby bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
